project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement logic to read the text file and process its content
Implement word counting logic to calculate the frequency of each word
Identify and sort the top 10 most common words
Display the results in the terminal
Write tests to validate the word counting and sorting functionalities
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure correctness
